name: A Roguelite
description:
This is "A Roguelite", a game I made in 5 days with Unity.

The idea is simple. Everytime you press Enter/Return, it generates a new Roguelite.

The goal is to survive as long as possible and to discover the true Depth of the game.

CONTROLS

Enter/Return : Generate New Roguelite

Keys W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys : Move 

Left Mouse Click : Shoot / Pick New Gun

Right Mouse Click : Throw Gun

HOW I MADE THE GAME
